FEC (Age of Sigmar) [3,090pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Death: Flesh-eater Courts) [3,090pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence, Muster Abilities

    • Leader [940pts]

      • Abhorrant Archregent [240pts]

        Selections: 2. Spectral Host, 4. The Grim Garland

        Categories: ABHORRANT, ABHORRANT ARCHREGENT, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, HERO, VAMPIRE, WIZARD, Leader

        Artefact: The Grim Garland, Command Abilities: Summon Imperial Guard, Magic: Abhorrant Archregent, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Ferocious Hunger, Mystic Shield, Spectral Host, Unit: Abhorrant Archregent, Weapon: Gory Talons and Fangs


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        The Grim Garland Subtract 2 from the Bravery of enemy units while they are within 6" of the bearer.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Summon Imperial Guard You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly model that has this command ability and has not used it before in the battle. That model summons 1 of the following units to the battlefield: 1 COURTIER; or 1 unit of up to 3 KNIGHTS; or 1 unit of up to 20 SERFS. The summoned unit is added to your army, and must be set up wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Abhorrant Archregent 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Ferocious Hunger
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Ferocious Hunger 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly FLESH‐EATER COURTS unit wholly within 24" of the caster and visible to them, and roll a D3. Add the roll to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Spectral Host 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit can fly until your next hero phase. If that unit can already fly, until your next hero phase it can run and still charge in the same turn. If the casting roll was 10 or more, you can pick up to 3 friendly units to be affected by the spell instead of 1.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Abhorrant Archregent 67104
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Gory Talons and Fangs Melee1"73+3+-11

      • Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Terrorgheist [420pts]

        Selections: 4. Horribly Resilient, 4. Miasmal Shroud, 5. The Dermal Robe

        Categories: VAMPIRE, MONSTER, HERO, WIZARD, ABHORRANT GHOUL KING, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, ABHORRANT, ROYAL TERRORGHEIST, Leader, Behemoth

        Artefact: The Dermal Robe, Command Abilities: Summon Royal Guard, Magic: Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Terrorgheist, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Miasmal Shroud, Mystic Shield, Unholy Vitality, Terrorgheist Wound Table: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Unit: Abhorrant Ghoul King on Terrorgheist, Unit Abilities: Death Shriek, Fly, Gaping Maw, Horribly Resilient, Infested , Royal Blood, Weapon: Death Shriek, Fanged Maw, Gory Talons and Fangs, Skeletal Claws


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        The Dermal Robe Add 1 to casting, dispelling and unbinding rolls for the bearer.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Summon Royal Guard You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly model that has this command ability and has not used it before in the battle. That model summons 1 unit of up to 3 Knights to the battlefield. The summoned unit is added to your army, and must be set up wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Terrorgheist 1/1An Abhorrant Ghoul King is a wizard. He can attempt to cast one spell in each of your hero phases, and attempt to unbind one spell in each enemy hero phase. He knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Unholy Vitality spells.
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Miasmal Shroud 5If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them and roll 3 dice. For each 5+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. In addition, if you rolled a triple, subtract 1 from hit and wound rolls for that unit until your next hero phase. If you rolled a double, subtract 1 from hit rolls only for that unit until you next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unholy Vitality 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly Flesh‐eater Courts unit wholly within 24" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to that unit. On a 5+ that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Terrorgheist Wound Table MoveDeath ShriekSkeletal Claws Ref
        00-03 14"64
        04-06 12"54
        07-09 10"43
        10-12 8"33
        13+ 6"22
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Abhorrant Ghoul King on Terrorgheist *14104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Death Shriek Roll a dice and add the Death Shriek value shown on this model’s damage table. If the total is higher than the target unit’s Bravery characteristic, the target unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the difference between its Bravery characteristic and the total.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Gaping Maw If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this model’s Fanged Maw is 6, that attack inflicts 6 mortal wounds on the target unit and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Horribly Resilient This model's Royal Blood ability heals up to 3 wounds instead of up to D3 wounds.
        Infested If this model is slain, before this model is removed from play each unit within 3" of this model suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Royal Blood In your hero phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

      • Crypt Haunter Courtier [120pts]

        Selections: 4. Carrion Wand

        Categories: MORDANT, HERO, COURTIER, CRYPT HAUNTER COURTIER, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, Leader

        Artefact: Carrion Wand, Unit: Crypt Haunter Courtier, Unit Abilities: Chosen of the King, Muster King's Chosen, Noble Blood, Weapon: Massive Bone Club, Rancid Talons


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Carrion Wand In your hero phase, the bearer can attempt to cast the Arcane Bolt spell as if they were a WIZARD. If the bearer is a WIZARD, add 1 to the casting roll when they attempt to cast Arcane Bolt instead.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Crypt Haunter Courtier 7"6104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chosen of the King You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this model while it is within 18" of any friendly ABHORRANTS.
        Muster King's Chosen In your hero phase, roll 6 dice for each friendly CRYPT HAUNTER COURTIER on the battlefield. For each 5+ you can return 1 slain model to a friendly CRYPT HORRORS unit that is within 10" of that CRYPT HAUNTER COURTIER. Slain models can be returned to more than one unit if you wish, but each successful dice roll can only be used to return a model to a single unit.
        Noble Blood In your hero phase, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Massive Bone Club Melee1"34+3+-3
        Rancid Talons Melee1"24+3+-1

      • Varghulf Courtier [160pts]

        Categories: DEATH, MORDANT, FLESH-EATER COURTS, HERO, COURTIER, VARGHULF COURTIER, Leader

        Unit: Varghulf Courtier, Unit Abilities: Feed on Dark Magic, Fly, King's Champion, Muster Royal Household, Victory Feast, Weapon: Dagger-like Fangs, Immense Claws


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Varghulf Courtier 10"8105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Feed on Dark Magic If a friendly ABHORRANT within 18" of this model successfully casts a spell, and it is not unbound, you can re-roll hit rolls for this model until the start of your next hero phase.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        King's Champion Add 2 the Attacks characteristic of this model's Immense Claws if it is within 3" of 10 or more enemy models when you pick the target unit(s) for its attacks.
        Muster Royal Household In your here phase, roll 6 dice for each friendly VARGHULF COURTIER on the battlefield. For each 2+ you can return 1 slain model to a friendly SERFS unit within 10" of that VARGHULF COURTIER. For each 5+ you can return 1 slain model to a friendly KNIGHTS unit within 10" of that VARGHULF COURTIER instead. Slain models can be returned to more than one unit if you wish, but each successful dice roll can only be used to return a model to a single unit.
        Victory Feast At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model's attacks in that combat phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Dagger-like Fangs Melee1"13+2+-2D3
        Immense Claws Melee2"43+3+-12

    • Other [340pts]

      • Charnel Throne

        Categories: CHARNEL THRONE, FLESH-EATER COURTS, SCENERY, Other

        Unit Abilities: Ghoulish Landmark, Ruler of All He Surveys


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Ghoulish Landmark FLESH-EATER COURTS units treat this terrain feature as having the Inspiring scenery rule. All other units treat this terrain feature as having the Sinister scenery rule. Inspiring: Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of units while they are within 1" of any Inspiring terrain features. Sinister: Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of units while they are within 1" of any Sinister terrain features.
        Ruler of All He Surveys An ABHORRANT ARCHREGENT that is within 1" of this terrain feature can use the Summon Imperial Guard command ability without a command point being spent. In addition, an Abhorrant Ghoul King (unit not keyword) that is within 1" of this terrain feature can use the Summon Men-at-arms command ability without a command point being spent. Battletome: Flesh-eater Courts, Official Errata, March 2019

      • Crypt Flayers [170pts]

        Selections: 3 Crypt Flayers [170pts]

        Categories: MORDANT, CRYPT FLAYERS, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, KNIGHTS, Other

        Unit: Crypt Flayers, Unit Abilities: Crypt Infernal, Death Scream, Fly, Skewering Strike, Weapon: Death Scream, Piercing Talons


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Crypt Flayers 12"4105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Crypt Infernal The leader of this unit is a Crypt Infernal. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Crypt Infernal’s Piercing Talons.
        Death Scream Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Death Scream. Instead roll 2D6. Subtract 2 if the target unit is more than 3" from the attacking model. If the result is higher than the target unit’s Bravery characteristic, the target unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the difference between its Bravery characteristic and the result.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Skewering Strike If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with Piercing Talons is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Death Scream Missile10"1****

        Dark Master If your general is an ABHORRANT ARCHREGENT or ABHORRANT GHOUL KING from this battalion, treat their warscroll as having the command abilities found on the warscrolls of any other units included in this battalion.

      • Battalion: Royal Family [440pts]

        Categories: FLESH-EATER COURTS, Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Lords of the Manor

        • Abhorrant Ghoul King [160pts]

          Selections: 3. Blood River Chalice, 5. Deranged Transformation, General, Ghurish Mawshard

          Categories: VAMPIRE, HERO, WIZARD, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, ABHORRANT, ABHORRANT GHOUL KING, Leader, General

          Artefact: Blood River Chalice, Ghurish Mawshard, Command Abilities: Summon Men-at-arms, Magic: Abhorrant Ghoul King, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Black Hunger, Deranged Transformation, Mystic Shield, Unit: Abhorrant Ghoul King, Unit Abilities: Royal Blood, Weapon: Gory Talons and Fangs

        • Abhorrant Ghoul King [160pts]

          Categories: VAMPIRE, HERO, WIZARD, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, ABHORRANT, ABHORRANT GHOUL KING, Leader

          Command Abilities: Summon Men-at-arms, Magic: Abhorrant Ghoul King, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Black Hunger, Mystic Shield, Unit: Abhorrant Ghoul King, Unit Abilities: Royal Blood, Weapon: Gory Talons and Fangs


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Blood River Chalice Once per battle, at the start of your hero phase, the bearer can use this artefact. If they do so, heal up to D6 wounds allocated to the bearer.
        Ghurish Mawshard Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy model within 1" of the bearer and roll a dice. If the roll is greater than that model's Wounds characteristic, that model is slain.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Lords of the Manor When a friendly COURTIER within 10" of any models from this battalion uses a Muster ability, you can roll 1 extra dice for that COURTIER when determining how many slain models the Muster ability allows you to return (usually this will mean that you roll 7 dice instead of 6 dice).
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Summon Men-at-arms You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly model that has this command ability and has not used it before in the battle. That model summons 1 unit of up to 10 SERFS to the battlefield. The summoned unit is added to your army, and must be set up wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Abhorrant Ghoul King 1/1An Abhorrant Ghoul King is a wizard. He can attempt to cast one spell in each of your hero phases, and attempt to unbind one spell in each enemy hero phase. He knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Black Hunger spells.
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Black Hunger 5If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS unit wholly within 24" of the caster and visible to them. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Deranged Transformation 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit with a Wounds characteric of up to 6 that is wholly within 24" of the caster and visible to them. Add that unit's Wound characteristic to its Move characteristic until you next hero phase. If the casting value was 10 or more, you can pick up to 3 friendly units to be affected by the spell instead of 1.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Abhorrant Ghoul King 6"6104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Royal Blood In your hero phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Gory Talons and Fangs Melee1"63+3+-11

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Flesh-Eater Courts

          Selections: Gristlegore

          Categories: FLESH-EATER COURTS

          Battle Trait: Deathless Courtiers, Feeding Frenzy, Grand Courts, Peerless Ferocity, Command Abilities: Call to War


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Deathless Courtiers Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS unit wholly within 12" of a friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS HERO. On a 6 that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Feeding Frenzy You can use this command ability in the combat phase after a friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS unit has fought for the first time in that phase and is wholly within 12" of a friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS HERO that is a general. If you do so, that unit can immediately make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with for a second time. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this ability more than once per phase. Battletome: Flesh-eater Courts, Official Errata, March 2019
        Grand Courts After you have chosen the Flesh-eater Courts allegiance for you army, you can choose one of the Grand Court keywords: MORGAUNT, HOLLOWMOURNE, BLISTERSKIN or GRISTLEGORE. All FLESH-EATER COURTS units in your army gain that keyword. You cannot pick or roll a delusion for a Grand Court, but all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities defined for that Grand Court.
        Peerless Ferocity If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made by a GRISTLEGORE HERO or GRISTLEGORE MONSTER is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on that target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Call to War You can use this command ability in the combat phase if a friendly GRISTLEGORE HERO or GRISTLEGORE MONSTER that has not fought in that phase is slain while it is wholly within 12" of a friendly GRISTLEGORE HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly GRISTLEGORE HERO that is a general. If you do so, before that model is removed from play, it can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this ability more than once per phase.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Malign Sorcery [70pts]

      • Endless Spell: Corpsemare Stampede [70pts]

        Categories: CORPSEMARE STAMPEDE, ENDLESS SPELL, SHYISH, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Corpsemare Stampede, Unit Abilities: Crazed Gallop, Fly, Predatory, Trampled Underfoot


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Corpsemare Stampede 7Only Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead and ABHORRANTS can attempt to cast this spell. If successfully cast, set up a Corpsemare Stampede model wholly within 3D6" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Crazed Gallop When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory A Corpsemare Stampede is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 14" and can fly.
        Trampled Underfoot After this model has moved, roll 5 dice for each unit that has any models it passed across. For each roll that is more than that unit’s Wounds characteristic, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. For each roll of 6, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead (whatever its Wounds characteristic is).

    • Realm of Battle

        Categories: Realm of Battle

        Spell: Curse of Rust, Glittering Robe, Molten Gaze, Rain of Lead, Rule of Burning Iron, Transmutation


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Curse of Rust 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from hit rolls and save rolls for that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p74
        Glittering Robe 6If successfully cast, re-roll save rolls of 1 for the caster until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p74
        Molten Gaze 6If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield within 12" of the caster that is visible to them and draw an imaginary straight line 1mm wide between that point and the closest part of the caster. Each unit other than the caster that has models passed across by this line suffers 1 mortal wound. Malign Sorcery p74
        Rain of Lead 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1" from that unit’s Move characteristic until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p74
        Rule of Burning Iron 8If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Roll a dice for each model in that unit. For each 6+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. Malign Sorcery p74
        Transmutation 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them and roll 3 dice. For each roll that is greater than that unit’s Wounds characteristic, 1 model from that unit is slain. Malign Sorcery p74

    • Scenery [100pts]

      • Scenery: Penumbral Engine [100pts]

        Categories: PENUMBRAL, PENUMBRAL ENGINE, SCENERY, STORMVAULT

        Unit Abilities: Deteriorating State, Repercussion of the Necroquake


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Deteriorating State At the start of each battle round after the first, roll a dice. On a 1-4 nothing happens. On a 5 or 6 the function that currently applies to all PENUMBRAL terrain features is replaced with the other function (see ‘Repercussions of the Necroquake’).
        Repercussion of the Necroquake At the start of the first battle round, after determining who has the first turn, roll a dice and consult the table on the right to determine which function all PENUMBRA terrain features on the battlefield gain for the duration of the battle.

        1-3: Orrey of Obfuscation: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target units wholly within 12" of any Penumbral terrain features.

        4-6: Orrey of Illumination: At the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 extra command point if any friendly HEROES are within 12" of any PENUMBRAL terrain features.

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)

Muster Abilities: Several Flesh-eater Courts units have Muster abilities, such as Muster Royal Guard, that allow you to return slain models to a unit. If you use a Muster ability, set up the returning models one at a time within 1" of a model from the unit they are returning to (this can be a model returned earlier in that phase). The models can only be set up within 3" of an enemy unit if any models from their unit are already within 3" of that enemy unit. (Battletome: Flesh-eater Courts p75)
